tADTFMediaDescriptor Struct Reference

The tADTFMediaDescriptor structure specifies the media descriptor information, that is, interesting data about the opened dat file. More...

Detailed Description

The tADTFMediaDescriptor structure specifies the media descriptor information, that is, interesting data about the opened dat file.
